lead_paragraph: David Rubenstein, co-founder of the Carlyle Group, said that private equity firms were lowering their fees in the wake of the 2008 market crash, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: David Rubenstein, co-founder of the Carlyle Group, said that private equity firms are lowering their fees in the wake of the 2008 market crash; "I'm not sure anybody really gets 2 and 20 anymore."
abstract: David Rubenstein, co-founder of the Carlyle Group, said that private equity firms are lowering their fees in the wake of the 2008 market crash; "I'm not sure anybody really gets 2 and 20 anymore."
